column4: cannon seems to have some spotty support natively in ubuntu, but they do have linux drivers on their asian support page usually
pici:  check out their asian support pages.  they usually have linux drivers

Its not really on-topic here, ##hardware or #ubuntu-offtopic would be a better place to ask. (but it looks like a laptop adapter for PATA attached, try pulling that off of the drive and you should see the pins).
